meanings.sent1: The coproprietors of the building meet every month to discuss maintenance.
meanings.sent2: The coproprietors of the land agreed to split the profits equally.
meanings.sent3: The coproprietors decided to have a friendly competition to see who could grow the biggest pumpkin on the shared property.
meanings.sent4: The coproprietors stood together like pillars, supporting the community with their joint ownership.
meanings.sent5: The coproprietors were like puzzle pieces, fitting perfectly together to create a harmonious whole.

meanings.definition: Individuals who share ownership of a property.
meanings.sent1: The coproprietors of the house each had their own unique style of decorating.
meanings.sent2: The coproprietors of the business worked together to make important decisions.
meanings.sent3: The coproprietors organized a potluck to celebrate their shared ownership of the vacation home.
meanings.sent4: The coproprietors' bond was as strong as the foundation of the property they owned together.
meanings.sent5: The coproprietors were like a team, each bringing something valuable to the table in their joint ownership.
